## Setup code chunk

```{r setup}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
post_meal_data <- read_csv2(
  here::here("data/post-meal-insulin.csv")
)
```

## Showing the data
```{r}
post_meal_data
```

```{r}
glimpse(post_meal_data)
```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Distribution of BMI"
#| label: fig-bmi-histo
ggplot(post_meal_data, aes(x = BMI)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```
@fig-bmi-histo
